title: (x) wedding invitation - Copperplate Gothic, Caflisch Script {Jan E, Florian}
content:
This may sound silly but my office was robbed when I was giving birth to my first baby! Anyways I run a wedding invitation business and I need to recreate this invite and I cannot remember the dang font I used. I believe one of them is cooperplate but who knows. Please Help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [rhubarbstdL.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203226/http:/typophile.com/files/rhubarbstdL.jpg) | 76.18 KB |

 [‹ (x) Neil Young square sans - Binerstyle/Report {Ignacio}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203226/http:/typophile.com/node/38177 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) script on Cachaça 51 label - (similar to) Caflish Script {Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203226/http:/typophile.com/node/38168 "Go to next forum topic")
author: joceybella

comments.content: Yes, one is Copperplate. Don’t know what the script is ,though.

think this is the same script someone was asking about yesterday; nobody knew what it was in that thread either. stoooooooof had a good substitute, though.

[http://typophile.com/node/38142i](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203226/http:/typophile.com/node/38142i "http://typophile.com/node/38142i")

Ha, Jan, tag team!  
And, it is [Caflis **c** h Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203226/http:/www.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1725.html), of course. Sorry for americanizing this [Swiss hero](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203226/http:/www.linotype.com/345/maxcaflisch.html). ;°)
